title: Running Boy: Star Soldier no Himitsu
synopsis: This anime was made by Hudson Soft, which created the "Star Soldier" game. Its designer, Yoichi Takahashi, appeared in a cameo and sang the theme songs.
staff: [['Yamakawa, Norio', ['Producer']], ['Yamamoto, Mataichirou', ['Producer']], ['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Oka, Kasumi', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Screenplay']]]
